text:
Definitely. Until then here's a possible workaround:
Create a meeting, drop the embed-code into your layout, (if not already created) create a url column in your HubDB, paste just the link (not the whole embed code) into it, replace the url part of the embed code in your layout with the HubDB column Hubl

Yeah, right now I’m just using a text field and supplying the ID like
```{% dnd_module path='@HubSpot/meetings', meeting='<https://meetings.HubSpot.com/{{>  row.meeting_id }}' %}{% end_dnd_module %}```
Just would be nicer to have a normal selection like you can with a Meeting field in modules, if that’s what its purpose is.
